Headline: Temporary Southbound #34 South Michigan Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street, Indiana, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 83rd, Stony Island, South Chicago, 87th, and resume normal route due to a street blockage near 87th/Jeffery.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #J14 Jeffrey Jump Reroute at 87th/Jeffery
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffrey Jump Reroute buses are temporarily rerouted near 87th/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffrey Jump Reroute buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 93rd, Stoney Island, South Chicago, Jeffery, and resume normal route due to street blockage near 87th/Jeffery.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th & Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th, then resume their normal route on Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express & #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express & 115 Pullman/115th buses temp rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn & 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express and #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn & 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/81st
ShortDescription: NB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 83rd, King Drive, 79th & Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/81st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 83rd, King Drive, 79th, then resume their normal route on Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/81st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
